name: Stifled
description:
HEAR your fear.

In Stifled, the sounds made by your in-game character and yourself through *microphone input reveal the otherwise hidden world through ‘echolocation’. However, undue noise will attract the attention of creatures lurking in the darkness. To survive, you will have to tread the line between making sounds to see, and staying quiet to stay hidden. (Put the microphone near your nose for even more challenge!)*Microphone Input
  • Microphone input is recommended but not necessary.
  • Sound generation can be replaced with a key input if you choose to.
VR Support
  • Stifled currently supports the use of Oculus DK2, Oculus CV1, and HTC VIVE headsets.

Please direct your support questions to our Steam forums.

Stifled is the spiritual successor to our award winning student project, Lurking.
